definitions: Each of the upper and lower bony structures in vertebrates forming the framework of the mouth and containing the teeth.
The lower movable bone of the jaw, or the part of the face containing it.
The mouth with its bones and teeth.
The grasping, biting, or crushing mouthparts of an invertebrate.
The gripping parts of a tool or machine, such as a wrench or vice.
The grasping or destructive power of something.
An opening likened to a mouth.
Talk or gossip, especially when lengthy or tedious.
